name: THREE CANDYBERRY MATCH
description:
Beautiful graphics with special effects from dozen of power ups to spice up the atmosphere.

Great for lovers of any match three game with familiar and friendly mechanics. Give it your best and try to become the ultimate fruit master!

THREE CANDYBERRY MATCH is a new game by Digital Carrot Productions. Experience the fruity sugar rush like never before. Beat the levels and collect all the sugar in this magic land of fruit. Many different game modes for you to enjoy and spend your time with.
